text:
The following code had to be commented out of web.xml when enabling the invoker
servlet, or else every page Tomcat returned would be blank, even non-existent URLs:

<!--
<load-on-startup>2</load-on-startup>
-->
creator: modulusdirection@yahoo.com
remm@apache.org
text:
invoker requires a privileged webapp. You should be posting about this on the
user mailing list.
